f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220 (16:14): ef6f2287bae00ba79475fbf56c2b6fee, validation of fragments doesn't depend on the parsing mode being known because the parse mode doesn't change the conformance definition.

f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220 (16:29): b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea, MicroXML not wanting DOCTYPEs doesn't really explain why having a non-DOCTYPE standards mode switch would be a good idea, since XML just uses standards mode anyway. Any new syntax should just not support quirks mode
